name: Nandin
description: What is the project about? Nandin Protocol operates within the Ethereum network, aiming primarily to make it easier for the crypto community to access investments, compound rewards, and decentralized finance (DeFi) service What makes your project unique? The Nandin Protocol is like a younger sibling inspired by the success of the Gauro Protocol. Nandin is like an upgraded version of Gauro, with some important improvements. It brings a flexible system filled with the latest features and tools meant to help people and change how decentralized finance (DeFi) works. In this explanation, we'll explore the different parts that make the Nandin Protocol stand out in the world of cryptocurrencies. These include the amazing Yield Enhancement Engine, Auto Liquidity Management, Staking Utility, and Fee Optimization Mechanism. History of your project. This is the first project we've done Whatâ€™s next for your project? The route has been updated. The list of influencers is ready. The product will update after launch What can your token be used for? Yield Enhancement Engine automatically rewards $NANDI token holders at regular intervals, typically every hour.
